Class CalcAreas

java.lang.Object
iscte.se.landmanagement.CalcAreas
public class CalcAreas extends Object
This class provides methods to calculate property areas and manage changes in a graph structure of properties.

    • toList

      public ArrayList<Property> toList(org.jgrapht.Graph<Property,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> graph)
      Converts the vertex set of a graph into a list of properties.
      Parameters:
      graph - the graph whose vertex set is to be converted
      Returns:
      a list of properties in the graph

    • calcArea3

      public double calcArea3(String areaT, String areaType)
      Calculates the Average Area of Property of a geographic area indicated by the user
      Parameters:
      areaT - Name of the area that will be calculated
      areaType - Type of the area that will be calculated (Parish/Municipality/Island)
      Returns:
      The Average Area of the Property considered in the case

    • calcArea4

      public double calcArea4(String input, String areaType)
      Calculates the Average Area of Property of a geographic area indicated by user considering that if adjacent properties have the same owner, they are just one
      Parameters:
      input - Name of the area that will be calculated
      areaType - Type of the area that will be calculated (Parish/Municipality/Island)
      Returns:
      The Average Area of the Property considered in the case

    • matchesLocal

      private boolean matchesLocal(Property property, String areaT, String type)
      Checks whether a property matches a specific geographic area based on its type.
      Parameters:
      property - the property to check
      areaT - the name of the geographic area
      type - the type of the area (Parish/Municipality/Island)
      Returns:
      true if the property matches the area, false otherwise

    • exploreConnectedComp

      private double exploreConnectedComp(org.jgrapht.Graph<Property,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> graph, Property property, Set<Property> visited)
      Explores a connected component of properties in the graph that are owned by the same owner, starting from a given property.
      Parameters:
      graph - the graph of properties
      property - the starting property
      visited - a set of already visited properties
      Returns:
      the total area of the connected component

    • changeProperty

      public GraphStructure changeProperty(Property t, Property s, int ns, int mt)
      Changes the ownership of two properties in the graph and returns the updated graph structure.
      Parameters:
      t - the first property to update
      s - the second property to update
      ns - the new owner ID for the first property
      mt - the new owner ID for the second property
      Returns:
      the updated graph structure
